trans-unit.source: Represents a snapshot of the <xref href="System.IO.Log.LogStore"></xref> instance that can be used to generate an archive.
trans-unit.target: 表示的快照<xref href="System.IO.Log.LogStore"></xref>可以用于生成存档的实例。

trans-unit.source: A LogArchiveSnapshot object contains the information necessary to generate a consistent backup of the data in a <xref:System.IO.Log.LogStore>.
trans-unit.target: LogArchiveSnapshot 对象包含在一种<xref:System.IO.Log.LogStore>。</xref:System.IO.Log.LogStore>中生成数据的一致备份所必需的信息

trans-unit.source: The actual data is contained in the enumerable collection of <xref:System.IO.Log.FileRegion> objects returned by the <xref:System.IO.Log.LogArchiveSnapshot.ArchiveRegions%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 可枚举集合中包含的实际数据<xref:System.IO.Log.FileRegion>返回的对象<xref:System.IO.Log.LogArchiveSnapshot.ArchiveRegions%2A>属性。</xref:System.IO.Log.LogArchiveSnapshot.ArchiveRegions%2A> </xref:System.IO.Log.FileRegion>

trans-unit.source: Each <xref:System.IO.Log.FileRegion> instance represents a sequence of bytes in a file that must be archived.
trans-unit.target: 每个<xref:System.IO.Log.FileRegion>实例都表示文件中必须存档中的字节序列。</xref:System.IO.Log.FileRegion>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IO.Log.LogArchiveSnapshot.ArchiveTail%2A>, <xref:System.IO.Log.LogArchiveSnapshot.BaseSequenceNumber%2A>, and <xref:System.IO.Log.LogArchiveSnapshot.LastSequenceNumber%2A> properties are for informational purposes only.
They can be recorded along with the archive data to provide optional information, but are not required to restore the data.
trans-unit.target: 它们可以记录以及存档的数据用于提供可选的信息，但不是需要还原数据。

trans-unit.source: Gets an enumerable collection of <xref href="System.IO.Log.FileRegion"></xref> instances containing the actual archival data.
trans-unit.target: 获取的可枚举集合<xref href="System.IO.Log.FileRegion"></xref>包含实际存档数据的实例。

trans-unit.source: An enumerable collection of <xref href="System.IO.Log.FileRegion"></xref> instances containing the actual archival data.
trans-unit.target: 可枚举集合<xref href="System.IO.Log.FileRegion"></xref>包含实际存档数据的实例。

trans-unit.source: Gets the sequence number of the <xref href="System.IO.Log.LogStore"></xref> archive tail at the time the snapshot was taken.
trans-unit.target: 获取的序列号<xref href="System.IO.Log.LogStore"></xref>的拍摄快照时存档尾数据。

trans-unit.source: The sequence number of the <xref href="System.IO.Log.LogStore"></xref> archive tail at the time the snapshot was taken.
trans-unit.target: 序列号<xref href="System.IO.Log.LogStore"></xref>的拍摄快照时存档尾数据。

trans-unit.source: Gets the base sequence number of the <xref href="System.IO.Log.LogStore"></xref> at the time the snapshot was taken.
trans-unit.target: 获取基序列号的<xref href="System.IO.Log.LogStore"></xref>时拍摄快照时。

trans-unit.source: The base sequence number of the <xref href="System.IO.Log.LogStore"></xref> at the time the snapshot was taken.
trans-unit.target: 基序列号<xref href="System.IO.Log.LogStore"></xref>时拍摄快照时。

trans-unit.source: Gets the last sequence number of the <xref href="System.IO.Log.LogStore"></xref> at the time the snapshot was taken.
trans-unit.target: 获取最后一个序列号<xref href="System.IO.Log.LogStore"></xref>时拍摄快照时。

trans-unit.source: The last sequence number of the <xref href="System.IO.Log.LogStore"></xref> at the time the snapshot was taken.
trans-unit.target: 最后一个序列号<xref href="System.IO.Log.LogStore"></xref>时拍摄快照时。
